subheading: Enrol today for £50 and spread the cost over 24 months interest free
title: IGCSE Biology
enrollment: Enrol today for £50 and spread the cost over 24 months interest free
study_pace: Flexible, you have up to 5 years to complete this course
includes: 1-2-1 tutor support, all course materials and more
description: Are you fascinated by the natural world? IGCSE Biology offers a captivating exploration of life sciences, from the smallest cells to the vast ecosystems that surround us.
course_overview: IGCSE Biology is a comprehensive course that provides students with a strong foundation in the fundamentals of biology. The course covers a wide range of topics, including cell biology, genetics, ecology, and human physiology.
eligibility: Anyone over the age of 14 can enrol on this course. No previous qualifications required.

section.title: How It Works
content: Students on our IGCSE Biology course can start at any time and study entirely online, offering complete flexibility. The course is designed to provide learners with a solid understanding of biology and the skills needed for further education or a career in science.
Each subject consists of guided online learning hours, with additional optional materials such as recommended exercises, readings, digital resources, and self-test tasks.
To be awarded your IGCSE qualification, you will be assessed through written examinations completed at an exam centre. You can find out more about exam centres and where to locate them here.

To complete the course, you will benefit from 1-2-1 tutor support and all necessary course materials. Upon passing the course, you’ll receive an IGCSE Biology qualification that will prepare you for progression to  A Levels, higher education, science-related careers or studying a Level 3 qualification at Online Business School.
Throughout the course, you’ll have access to various support resources, including webinars, social learning forums, and additional materials to enhance your learning experience.

sublists: Movement into and out of cells

title: IGCSE Business Studies
subheading: Enrol today for £50 and spread the cost over 24 months interest free
enrollment: Enrol today for £50 and spread the cost over 24 months interest free
includes: 1-2-1 tutor support, all course materials and more
description: Are you intrigued by the world of business and entrepreneurship? IGCSE Business Studies offers a captivating exploration of business principles, from the smallest startups to multinational corporations.
course_overview: Through engaging lessons, case studies, and practical exercises, you’ll gain a solid understanding of the fundamental concepts that drive business activity.

section.title: How It Works
content: Students on our IGCSE Business Studies course can start at any time and study entirely online, offering complete flexibility. The course is designed to provide learners with a solid understanding of business and the skills needed for further education or a career in business.
Each subject consists of guided online learning hours, with additional optional materials such as recommended exercises, readings, digital resources, and self-test tasks.
To be awarded your IGCSE qualification, you will be assessed through written examinations completed at an exam centre. You can find out more about exam centres and where to locate them here.

To complete the course, you will benefit from 1-2-1 tutor support and all necessary course materials. Upon passing the course, you’ll receive an IGCSE Business Studies qualification that will prepare you for progression to  A Levels, higher education, science-related careers or studying a Level 3 qualification at Online Business School.
Throughout the course, you’ll have access to various support resources, including webinars, social learning forums, and additional materials to enhance your learning experience.

section.title: Course Modules
section.heading: Subject Content
modules1: This course covers core areas essential to understanding business functions and operations:

sublists.name: Understanding business activity
sublists.description: Covers the purpose and nature of business activity, classification of businesses, the role of enterprise and entrepreneurs, business growth, business size measurement, types of business organisations, and business and stakeholder objectives.

sublists.name: People in business
sublists.description: Focuses on human resources, including workforce motivation, business organisation and management, recruitment, selection, training, and internal and external communication.

sublists.name: Marketing
sublists.description: Explores the role of marketing, niche vs mass markets, market segmentation, market research, the marketing mix (four Ps), and strategies for consumer influence in domestic and international markets.

sublists.name: Operations management
sublists.description: Introduces production methods, ways to increase productivity, production costs, break-even analysis, quality assurance, and business location decisions.

sublists.name: Financial information and decisions
sublists.description: Examines the need for and sources of business finance, cash-flow forecasting, working capital, income statements, financial position statements, and account analysis.

sublists.name: External influences on business activity
sublists.description: Analyzes external influences on business including economic, environmental, ethical, legal, and global factors such as globalisation, multinational businesses, and exchange rates.

title: IGCSE English-First Language
enrollment: Enrol today for £50 and spread the cost over 24 months interest free
includes: 1-2-1 tutor support, all course materials and more
description: IGCSE English – First Language is designed for learners whose native language is English. The course aims to equip students with the essential skills to communicate clearly, effectively, and accurately both in speech and writing.
course_overview: This IGCSE equips students with strong communication skills, including clear and persuasive expression, mastery of language mechanics, and a rich vocabulary. The course fosters personal style and critical thinking skills through extensive reading and analysis of texts.

section.title: How It Works
content: Students on our IGCSE English-First Language course can start at any time and study entirely online, offering complete flexibility. The course is designed to provide learners with a solid understanding of business and the skills needed for further education or a career in english.
Each subject consists of guided online learning hours, with additional optional materials such as recommended exercises, readings, digital resources, and self-test tasks.
To be awarded your IGCSE qualification, you will be assessed through written examinations completed at an exam centre. You can find out more about exam centres and where to locate them here.

To complete the course, you will benefit from 1-2-1 tutor support and all necessary course materials. Upon passing the course, you’ll receive an IGCSE English- First qualification that will prepare you for progression to  A Levels, higher education, science-related careers or studying a Level 3 qualification at Online Business School.
Throughout the course, you’ll have access to various support resources, including webinars, social learning forums, and additional materials to enhance your learning experience.

section.title: Course Modules
section.heading: Subject Content
modules1: This course focuses on essential English communication skills across three main areas:

sublists.name: Reading
sublists.description: Focuses on understanding written texts, summarising and evaluating content, analysing how writers influence readers, selecting relevant information, and recognising figurative language and literary devices. Candidates engage with a range of text types including literature, fiction, non-fiction, essays, reviews, and articles from the 20th and 21st centuries.

sublists.name: Writing
sublists.description: Develops skills to express thoughts and emotions, organise facts and opinions, use varied vocabulary, apply appropriate sentence structures, and demonstrate awareness of audience, purpose, and form. Candidates are introduced to various writing forms such as descriptive, narrative, discursive, argumentative, and persuasive in formats like letters, reports, articles, journals, speeches, interviews, and summaries.

sublists.name: Speaking and Listening
sublists.description: Covers the ability to describe experiences, express thoughts and feelings, convey complex ideas, and communicate clearly and appropriately. Also includes engaging effectively in conversations across different contexts.

eligibility: Anyone over the age of 14 can enrol on this course. No previous qualifications required.

modules.name: Population and settlement
modules.description: Covers population dynamics, migration, population structure, density and distribution, rural and urban settlements, service provision, urbanisation, and urban settlements.

modules.name: The natural environment
modules.description: Focuses on natural physical processes and features including earthquakes, volcanoes, rivers, coasts, weather, climate, and natural vegetation.

modules.name: Economic development
modules.description: Explores themes of development, food production, industry, tourism, energy, water, and the environmental risks associated with economic development.

content: Students on our IGCSE Travel & Tourism course can start at any time and study entirely online, offering complete flexibility. The course is designed to provide learners with a solid understanding of Travel & Tourism and the skills needed for further education or a career in Travel & Tourism
Each subject consists of guided online learning hours, with additional optional materials such as recommended exercises, readings, digital resources, and self-test tasks.
To be awarded your IGCSE qualification, you will be assessed through written examinations completed at an exam centre. You can find out more about exam centres and where to locate them here.

To complete the course, you will benefit from 1-2-1 tutor support and all necessary course materials. Upon passing the course, you’ll receive an IGCSE Travel & Tourism qualification that will prepare you for progression to A Levels, higher education, science-related careers or studying a Level 3 qualification at Online Business School.
Throughout the course, you’ll have access to various support resources, including webinars, social learning forums, and additional materials to enhance your learning experience.

sublists: Introduction to the main travel and tourism definitions and concepts

section.title: Entry Requirements
section.heading: Am I eligible for this programme?
content: The typical age at which people choose to complete the IGCES is 14 to 16, but anyone over the age of 14 can enrol on this course. You also do not need any previous qualifications to be eligible for this course.

section.title: Sitting the Exam
content: Locate an approved exam centre that accepts private candidates.
Register with the exam centre and pay required fees.
Verify your statement of entry for accuracy.
Bring valid identification to each exam.
Maintain communication with the exam centre or provider for inquiries and access arrangements.
Request special consideration after the exams if needed.
Collect your exam results and certificates.
Request a review of marking or appeal through the exam centre if necessary.
Online Business School will assist in finding an approved exam centre.
We support you with registration and meeting all exam requirements and deadlines.
We provide guidance on exam preparation and verification of entry statements.
We clarify identification needs and access arrangements.
We assist with post-exam steps including special considerations, results collection, and appeals.

section.title: Cost and payments
content: IGCSE Biology: £399
Enrol with a £50 deposit and then £14.55 a month for 24 months, interest-free.
Students can make payment using one of the following methods:

section.title: Career Progression
section.heading: Progression
content: Upon completion of this course, students will have the foundations and fundamental knowledge needed to study A levels or a Level 3 qualification with Online Business School.
